title: Any idea what typeface this is?
content:
Hi guys, I’d really appreciate if anyone could identify the font used in the attached image. I’ve found a few close like Eureka Sans. But it’s not quite right.

Thanks for any help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330135553im_/http:/typophile.com/cms/files/image001_5454.jpg)

 [‹ Bouncy script font](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330135553/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56350 "Go to previous forum topic") [DOS-like font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330135553/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56349 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tyeardley

comments.content:
Fantastic! Thanks begsini.

I’ve only been a member on here 30 minutes and thats a huge help!
